page.title: 08HEALTH
page.content: Law Hospital is a general hospital serving the County of Lanarkshire. The nurses are trained at the Nursing College which has students from all over the world,e.g.India,South America,England,Ireland and Pakistan. The doctors are trained in universities at Edinburgh or Glasgow. Most of the nurses stay at the hospital in the Nurses' Home. Law Hospital doesn't do transplants but it deals with orthopeadic and geriatric conditions.It also has a casualty area.The other things with which the hospital deals are medical, surgical,intensive care and psychiatry cases. The hospital doesn't deal with childbirth but it is a possibility in the future.It takes in sick babies and young children.It costs Â£100 to stay in hospital for a day.
